Hi all  would you suggest to have either UOB PPV or CITI Rewards? Or to hold both cards?
Also for transport use  i took Standard Chartered Smart Credit Card. Is this a good choice for transport or is there any better UOB card?
their uses kinda overlap. Id only suggest having both if you are exceeding 1k cap on citi rewards.

citi rewards with amaze can earn 4mpd on more categories than UOB PPV for online. UOB PPV is very good for mobile contactless payment (blacklist approach) but online categories that earn 4mpd are limited (whitelist). However  UNI$ are pooled together with other UOB miles card.
Transport u mean simplygo or ride hailing services
May i know credit cards shall I use to get max miles for buying flight ticket and booking hotel on agoda? I have dbs women world  citi reward amaza  citi premier miles  hsbc revo and ocbc 365
Dbs woman's world card. There is also this app called heymax to check which card to use.https://hmsg.link/heymax
